text: Is anyone else having an issue with related posts (based on tags) not displaying? I literally have to edit the blog post 3-5 times in order for the related posts to show up on the live site.
In a blog post. has anybody successfully included a Github gist?

including the `<script>` embed code from github yields nothing, even when I change display settings, add a fixed height, etc., and Iâ€™d love the syntax highlighting to come through without having to use Prism or its analogues

Not sure if this is the right place to ask, but I am trying to take the "CMS for Developers Practicum" and had a question.

Do we have to use the assets that's being showed in the documentation here - <https://academy.HubSpot.com/practicum/cms-for-developers-certification>
*Or* 
we can simply use whatever images to showcase the feature/functionality of the test ?
You can use any kind of images but try to use copyright free images (get it from <http://unsplash.com|unsplash.com>)
Yes for sure. That make sense. Thanks Manoj.
